field.name: name
field.label: Client Name
field.description: Enter the name of the client or organization. This name will be used to identify the client in the SIMON system and will be sent with site data submissions.

field.name: contact_name
field.label: Contact Name
field.description: Enter the name of the primary contact person for this client. This is optional but recommended for better communication.

field.name: contact_email
field.label: Contact Email
field.description: Enter the primary contact email address for this client. This email may be used for notifications and communication regarding the client's sites.

field.name: notes
field.label: Notes
field.description: Optional notes or additional information about this client. This information is stored in the SIMON system for reference.

field.name: status
field.label: Status
field.description: Set the status of this client. Disabled clients will not have their site data submitted to the SIMON API.
